item.title: Final Project
item.description: Convert Java code to flowchart Once I said to run C language on JVM as my final project, but find it meaningless and useless without making out any scene. During my internship in Pingan fu, I read the heavy and document-less Java code day by day and did the stuff on the test framework. One day, I was reading a code fragment about the accounting voucher using the cartesian set,
